attributes.action: Legalise Cannabis growing,use and possession for Religious/Spiritual purposes.
attributes.background: Cannabis has a long entheogenic history and its use in religious and spiritual ceremonies is very well documented globally. We should not persecute people for the use of cannabis in religious rituals.
